name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Video supplement:
The video shows that the man threw down one of the traffic policemen and attacked the traffic policeman's neck with a weapon.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 16, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Zhongrong Trust collapsed, and investors knelt down to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China Cyberspace Security Association: Intel products should be systematically investigated for cybersecurity risks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, a Henan village bank depositor went to Kaifeng New Oriental Village Bank and found that the deposit balance in his online banking account was clearly visible, but was inexplicably set to "only in, no out". The bank staff remained silent, refused to process deposit withdrawals, refused to explain why the deposits were "only in, no out", and could not produce any deposit freezing procedures from any department.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 16 (Release), Nanchang Economic Development Zone, Jiangxi Province, since last year, the local AUX factory has continued to emit toxic and harmful gases, causing the surrounding air to be unbearable. Many residents have experienced nosebleeds, sore throats, retching, dizziness and other symptoms. Although local residents have reported the situation through various legal channels, the problem has not been resolved so far. It is reported that there are many residential areas and universities, middle schools and primary schools next to the factory, which is a densely populated area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 16, a murder occurred in Shenqiu County, Zhoukou City, Henan Province, leaving a message stating that three people were killed.
Regarding the murderer's motive, there are currently rumors that it was a murder of love, but the true situation remains to be verified. An investigation letter circulated online showed that a criminal case occurred in Huaidian Town, Shenqiu County on October 16, 2024, and the suspect drove away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The buyer is a fraudster and the seller is also a fugitive, and they are still being “recovered”?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 16, Huang Chunfa, a businessman from Fujian, published a "thank you letter" on his WeChat public account, "thanking" himself for being detained in Shangrao Detention Center in Jiangxi for 5 years.
In the article, the businessman said that his case was clearly investigated by the procuratorate and returned because of insufficient evidence, but in the end he was still prosecuted under some unknown pressure. After being prosecuted, the court still acquitted him, but the detention center refused to grant bail.
The businessman said, "The detention center is good. I don't need to worry about business operations, let alone weight loss. My physical fitness has greatly improved. Such a regular life is really something that billions of assets can't buy. I especially want to invite leaders of the Shangrao Municipal Political and Legal System to come in and eat and live with me for a few years. I guarantee that you will all be in good health and eat delicious food. Leaders of Shangrao, if you don't come now, it will be too late and you won't be able to grab a seat."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 16 (released), in August this year, the Organization Department and the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security of Guangdong Province issued a notice announcing that college graduates who have completed the "Three Supports and One Assistance" (supporting medical care, education, agriculture and rural revitalization) will no longer enjoy extra points for the examination. Some local recruitments have even issued recruitment instructions, confirming that the "Three Supports and One Assistance" extra points are valid, but before the exam, it was stopped by the provincial department and notified that candidates could not get extra points.
Many students who chose to participate in the "Three Supports and One Assistance" project two years ago have now ended up with nothing, wasting two years of youth, and it is no longer attractive to find a job in private enterprises, facing the dilemma of unemployment.
